documents.t: classifies what type of deployment is needed for a certain directory Returns: Object - the configuration needed to deploy Param Type Description directory String the directory of which to classify

handles the deployment of an application tar Param Type Description option Object option.name String the name of the the deployment option.bundlePath String the directory of which the tar of the application is located option.token String token associated with the user that want to deploy the application option.username String username of the user the token is associated too

the cli instance that holds all options and methods to talk to the deploy.sh service Param Type Description options Object contains defaults and overrides options.url String the url of the remote deploy.sh service options.application String the deployed application name to alter options.mongo String the mongo connection string used by deploy.sh service when running deploy serve --mongo ''

Deals with uploading a specified bundle Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.name String the name of the specified application options.bundle Stream a file stream of the tar

calls the login api to get a token to persist for future requests Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.username String username of the account options.password String password associated with the account

prompts the user to register account Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.username String username of the account options.password String password associated with the account

calls the logout api to invalidate token Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.token String token to make authenticated calls options.username String username linked to the token

gets the application logs Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.token String token to make authenticated calls options.username String username linked to the token options.name String name of the deployment

gets the user's deployed applications Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.token String token to make authenticated calls options.username String username linked to the token [options.name] String name of the deployment

deletes the specified deployment Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.token String token to make authenticated calls options.username String username linked to the token options.name String name of the deployment
gets the user details Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options.token String token to make authenticated calls options.username String username linked to the token

persists the token and username locally Kind: static method of CLI Param Type Description options Object options.token String token to make authenticated calls options.username String username linked to the token
gets the token and username that were persisted locally Kind: static method of CLI

contains is a function that takes an array and see if the condition matches Kind: inner method of lib/helpers/util Returns: Boolean - - responds back with a boolean value Param Type Description arr Array array to check with rules contains Array rules to make sure the arr contains the following Example contains( ["index.html", "main.css"], ["index.html", "!Dockerfile", "!package.json"]); Copy

Kind: global class Properties Name Type Description id String the container id name String the name of the deployment port Number the port that the container has exposed subdomain String the subdomain of the application directory String the directory of tared application username String the username who owns the deployment Deployment new Deployment() .update(options) ⇒ Promise .del(name) ⇒ Promise .proxy(subdomain) ⇒ Promise .decorate(deployment) ⇒ Promise .get(options) ⇒ Promise .getAll() ⇒ Promise .start([name]) ⇒ Promise .stop([name]) ⇒ Promise .logs(name, token, username) ⇒ Promise .remove(name) ⇒ Promise

updates a deployment Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description options Object options.name String the name of the deployment options.username String the username associated with this deployment

deletes the specified deployment from the user Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description name String the name of the deployment options.token String the token for the user who owns the deployment options.username String the username associated with this deployment
express middleware to proxy to correct container Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description subdomain String the subdomain for the application being requested
decorates a deployment with the correct data on get Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description deployment Deployment a deployment instance

gets a specific deployment for the specified user Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description options Object options.name String the name of the deployment options.token String the token for the user who owns the deployment options.username String the username associated with this deployment option.create Boolean create a deployment if not found

gets all deployments for the specified user Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description options.token String the token for the user who owns the deployment options.username String the username associated with this deployment

stops a container or all containers Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description [name] String to stop a specific container a name property is needed [options.token] String the token for the user who owns the deployment [options.username] String the username associated with this deployment

retrieves from a given instance Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description name String instance name token String the token for the user who owns the deployment username String the username associated with this deployment

removes a specific container, will stop and cleanup all necessary files Kind: static method of Deployment Param Type Description name String the name of the container options.token String the token for the user who owns the deployment options.username String the username associated with this deployment

Kind: global class Properties Name Type Description subdomain String the subdomain of the request url String the url that was being accessed time Number the time it took to access the resource method String the http verb that describes the request statusCode String the statusCode associated with the request userAgent String the userAgent that access the resource referer String the referer that the user was at before accessing the address acceptLanguage String browser based language preferences Request new Request() .log(req, res, next) .count(subdomain) ⇒ Promise .del(subdomain) ⇒ Promise
express middleware that logs requests Kind: static method of Request Param Type Description req Object express request object res Object express response object next function callback function
returns the amount of requests for the specified subdomain Kind: static method of Request Param Type Description subdomain string the subdomain of which to get the count of requests for
removes all entries associated with a particular subdomain Kind: static method of Request Param Type Description subdomain String the subdomain that the entries are related to

Kind: global class Properties Name Type Description username String a string that defines the user's accounts password String a password for the user [token] String an access token User new User() .authenticateMiddleware(req, res, next) .authenticate(token, username) ⇒ Promise .logout(token, username) ⇒ Promise .login(username, password) ⇒ Promise .register(username, password) ⇒ Promise

middleware to verify the username and token are valid, will then set the user to req.user Kind: static method of User Param Type Description req Object express request res Object express response next function callback to go to next middleware
verify the username and token are valid Kind: static method of User Param Type Description token String the token associated with the username username String the username of the user
logs out a user by deleting their token Kind: static method of User Param Type Description token String the token associated with the username username String the username of the user
logs in a user and returns Kind: static method of User Param Type Description username String the username of the user who is logging in password String the password associated with the user
registers a user Kind: static method of User Param Type Description username String the username of the user who is logging in password String the password associated with the user
Firstly we must install deploy.sh. npm install deploy.sh -g Copy

Node.js version 14 or above: When installing Node.js, you are recommended to check all checkboxes related to dependencies. Docker is how deploy.sh runs and is required to start new applications Mongo is required to store application state and logs
In order to deploy your applications you will need to spin up a deploy.sh server deploy server Copy % deploy serve✔ Started 0 deployment(s) successfully⛅️ deploy.sh is running on port 5000 Copy

In order to do anything you must first go through the registration process by running: deploy register Copy For this example I am going to use the folder in examples/docker in https://github.com/gabrielcsapo/deploy.sh. deploy Copy To look at the logs from the docker container itself, simply run deploy logs deploy logs Copy
